description.de: Passende Typen (Mehrfachauswahl) wie SoftwareApplication, WebApplication, Service …
description.en: Suitable types (multiple choice) such as SoftwareApplication, WebApplication, Service …
Functional category (knowledge management, collaboration, data storage …)

prompt.de: Anwendungskategorie. Verwende EXAKT die Labels, z.B. 'Lernmanagement (LMS)', 'KI-Tools/Sprachmodelle', 'Zusammenarbeit & Kommunikation'.
prompt.en: Application category. Use EXACT labels, e.g. 'Learning Management (LMS)', 'AI Tools/Language Models', 'Collaboration & Communication'.

description.de: Zielplattform(en): Web, Desktop, Mobil, Embedded, VR/AR, Cross-Plattform.
description.en: Target platform(s): Web, Desktop, Mobile, Embedded, VR/AR, Cross-Platform.

description.de: Nur relevant, wenn keine reine Cloud-Software.
description.en: Only relevant if not pure cloud software.

description.de: Datum der aktuellen Version oder Erstveröffentlichung im Format YYYY-MM-DD, z.B. 2024-03-15.
description.en: Date of the current version or initial release in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2024-03-15.

prompt.en: Release date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. '2024-03-15'.
Download URL(s), e.g. app store link or installation package.
Brand/product line, e.g. 'Microsoft 365', 'Google Workspace', 'Adobe Creative Cloud'.

description.de: Länder/Regionen, in denen Service/Produkt offiziell angeboten wird.
description.en: Countries/regions where the service/product is officially offered.

prompt.en: Free to use? true or false.

description.en: URL of the terms of service.

prompt.en: URL of the terms of service, e.g. 'https://example.com/tos'.
URL of the privacy policy, e.g. 'https://example.com/privacy'.

description.de: Einschätzung/Status, z. B. DSGVO-Konformität, AVV vorhanden.
description.en: Assessment/Status, e.g., GDPR compliance, AVV available.

prompt.de: Datenschutz-Status. Verwende EXAKT: 'DSGVO-konform (Selbstauskunft)', 'AV-Vertrag vorhanden', 'Datenverarbeitung in EU/EWR', 'Datenverarbeitung außerhalb EU/EWR', 'Unklar/prüfen'.
prompt.en: Data protection status. Use EXACT: 'GDPR-compliant (self-disclosure)', 'Data Processing Agreement available', 'Data processing in EU/EEA', 'Data processing outside EU/EEA', 'Unclear/check'.
Target groups. Use EXACT: 'Teachers', 'Learners', 'Students (K-12)', 'Students (Higher Ed)', 'Parents', 'School Leadership', 'IT Administration', 'Trainers', 'Authors'.

description.de: „Ich will …“ (z. B. Video schneiden, kooperativ schreiben).
description.en: “I want to …” (e.g. edit video, write cooperatively).

prompt.en: Use cases, e.g. 'edit video', 'write cooperatively', 'create quizzes'.
Modalities. Use EXACT: 'Digital', 'Analog', 'Online', 'Offline', 'Requires additional software', 'Requires additional hardware'.

description.de: Sprache(n), in denen die Benutzeroberfläche des Tools verfügbar ist.
description.en: Language(s) in which the tool's user interface is available.

description.de: Wichtigste Funktionen und Fähigkeiten des Tools (Stichpunkte).
description.en: Key features and capabilities of the tool (bullet points).

description.de: Gibt an, ob das Tool quelloffen (Open Source) ist.
description.en: Indicates whether the tool is open source.
Supported accessibility features of the tool.

prompt.en: Accessibility. Use EXACT: 'Screen reader support', 'Keyboard navigation', 'Captions/Subtitles', 'High contrast', 'Magnification', 'Easy language', 'Sign language'.

description.de: URLs, die dasselbe Tool/denselben Service bezeichnen (z.B. Wikipedia, Wikidata, AlternativeTo).
description.en: URLs identifying the same tool/service (e.g. Wikipedia, Wikidata, AlternativeTo).

prompt.de: URLs zu identischen Ressourcen, z.B. Wikipedia-Artikel, Wikidata-Eintrag, AlternativeTo-Seite.
prompt.en: URLs to identical resources, e.g. Wikipedia article, Wikidata entry, AlternativeTo page.

description.de: Links zu verwandten Ressourcen (Dokumentation, Tutorials, Community-Forum, Support).
description.en: Links to related resources (documentation, tutorials, community forum, support).

prompt.de: Verwandte Links, z.B. Dokumentation, Tutorials, Community-Forum, Support-Seite.
prompt.en: Related links, e.g. documentation, tutorials, community forum, support page.
